Title: Object: Papyrus Sallier 1
Description: Papyrus Sallier I; sheet 6; Hieratic literary text. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto: col 9.1 "Eulogy of Merenptah", col 9.1-9.2 "Complaint about the taking away of certain fields", col 9.9-9.11 "Rebuke to a dissipated Scribe"
Curator's comments: Miscellany Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. 86-88 Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. 323-28
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (322164) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/322164)
